sections.title: interests
sections.content: From Auckland, NZ. Singer & songwriter: acapella with [Princeton Footnotes](http://www.princetonfootnotes.com), folk duo with '[Baker & Goods](https://bakerandgoods.bandcamp.com/releases)', past singer in pop band '[Chasing April](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Us3CcZmnwFA)'. Music director and actor in various musicals, writer for the [Triangle Club](http://www.triangleshow.com/) at Princeton. NZ Waterpolo representative 2012, Princeton Men's WP 2014, NZ Champion Marist Men's WP 2014. Recently completed half iron man.

body.title: Artirigo AG, tech startup
body.content: React Native frontend for iOS and Android. In addition, Dockerized and made adjustments to existing Rails application

body.title: Freelance Software Developer
body.content: Developed a full stack from scratch with React Native, Hapi, Sequelize and MariaDB, an iOS app with Swift and Parse, and a custom React website.

body.title: Digital Humanities Fellow, Paideia Institute
body.content: NationBuilder website (Rails, Liquid, CSS, JavaScript), an iOS app with Swift, a Chrome extensions. Also automated several internal processes via several Python scripts.

body.title: Sales Intern, Dentboard
body.content: A startup providing specialized software for the dental industry. Bootstrapped a website cataloguing related industry.

body.title: Princeton University
body.content: Major in Computer Science. Classes also in intellectual history, dance, theatre, economics and other.

sections.title: portfolio | references
sections.content: To browse my code, see my [OpenSourceMe account on Github](https://github.com/OpenSourceMe) for the source code of this site, or my [Github account](https://github.com/breezykermo). References available on request.
